refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: BiblioMixed is an entry in a Bibliography. The contents of BiblioMixed includes all necessary punctuation for formatting. Presentation systems usually display all of the elements in a BiblioMixed.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: BiblioMixed entries are cooked. In addition to named fields, they can contain interspersed #PCDATA to provide punctuation and other formatting information.
The processing system is generally expected to present each and every element in the entry, and all interspersed #PCDATA, in the order in which it occurs.
